feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Racks 31A19/31A20/31A21 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 16, 21:00 UTC  -  Dec 17, 06:00 UTC

Nov 4, 21:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on hosts located in racks 31A19, 31A20 and 31A21.

Start time : 16/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/12/2025 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable up to 9 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be moving hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 to RBX7.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2A][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 11, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Oct 23, 16:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2A region.

Start time : 11/12/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 11/12/2025 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Managed vSphere] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 12, 08:00 UTC  -  Nov 13, 17:00 UTC

Nov 4, 21:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 12/11/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 13/11/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [BHS8][Managed VMware Cloud Director] - Racks BHS0814B02A incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 4, 21:04 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our has been resolved.

Start time : 04/11/2025 15:00 UTC
End time : 04/11/2025 19:05 UTC
Root Cause : This incident is caused by this maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/dwvvjnzlhksh

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 4, 15:09 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware Cloud Director offer in BHS8, rack BHS0814B02A.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 04/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Public and private server interfaces have lost network access in the specified racks.
Customers Impact : Customers are unable to access their public and private interfaces for their servers located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by this maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/dwvvjnzlhksh
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - rack R806L20 & R806L19 incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 4, 11:56 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere has been resolved.

Start time : 04/11/2025 08:50 UTC
End time : 04/11/2025 11:55 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 4, 11:51 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A significant number of hosts are available.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 4, 09:17 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed vSphere offer on the specific rack .

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 04/11/2025 08:50 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
